title: Indian Foreign Secretary on President’s electoral victory: Confidence and hope for Indo-Lanka ties
content: Indian Foreign Secretary Nirupama Rao who met President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Janadhipathi Mandiraya yesterday congratulated the President for his resounding victory at the recent Presidential Election.
